DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the lot to lot consistency, safety and immune response of the Novartis Meningococcal ACWY conjugate vaccine in healthy US adolescents and adults.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate Safety and Immune Response of Novartis Meningococcal ACWY Conjugate Vaccine In US Adolescents and Adults
DOC.criteria: Healthy subjects who are 1155 years of age inclusive and who have given appropriate written assent and/or consent Subjects with a previous or suspected disease caused by N. meningitidis previous immunization with a meningococcal vaccine or vaccine containing meningococcal antigen(s) previous or suspected disease caused by N. meningitidis Any serious acute, chronic or progressive disease Pregnant or breastfeeding
